description: Twelve men arrested on Friday were allegedly plotting to attack mosques, politicians and immigrants.
title: German far-right group 'planned attacks on mosques'
title_page: German far-right group 'planned attacks on mosques' - BBC News
maintext: Last week he allegedly met with other members and discussed plans for ten separate attacks in the country, including massacres at mosques similar to those carried out in New Zealand last year. They reportedly hoped their actions would provoke counter-attacks and lead to a civil war.
